description: A Marvel Rivals plugin that gets info about heros and player data

functions.name: mrivals_get_character_info
functions.description: Provides lore, role, difficulty, team, attack type, and a signature ability for a Marvel Rivals hero. Use when the user asks about a specific hero (e.g., Spider-Man, Iron Man).

character_name.description: [required] character_name - The Hero's name, e.g., Spider-Man, Iron Man. Usually denoted by the word 'for' in a query. For example, in the query that asks 'Find me the character info for Iron Man', the character_name would be Iron Man.

functions.name: mrivals_get_player_stats
functions.description: Gets a user/player number of matches, win percentage, kills, assists, mvps, deaths, and time played. Gets stats of a user

player_name.description: [required] player_name - gamer tag of a user in marvel rivals, it would be his player id, username, or uid which is a string of numbers that is the player id
